item.title: LACTF CTF 2026
item.description: LA CTF was organized from Sat, 07 Feb. 2026 to Mon, 09 Feb. 2026, featuring challenges from different categories like Cryptography, Miscelleaneous, Reverse Engineering, Pwn and Web Exploitation. I participated with my team Blue Lock Eleven, got 133/955 rank overall.

item.title: Pascal CTF
item.description: PascalCTF is a cybersecurity event organized by high school students to attract other students to the world of CTFs. The categories included Miscellaneous, Cryptography, Web Security, Reverse Engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Binary Exploitation

item.title: SMS Based Vehicle Tracking
item.description: A vehicle tracking system that uses SMS for real-time location updates and monitoring

item.title: Cryptopals Challenges
item.description: A collection of cryptography challenges designed to teach the fundamentals of cryptography through practical exercises

item.title: NeRF and 3D Gaussian Splatting
item.description: A research project comparing Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) and 3D Gaussian Splatting for 3D scene reconstruction

item.title: Holiday Remainder
item.description: A web application that allows us to view upcoming holidays and events
